conclusion: Preliminary objection dismissed (non-exhaustion);Violation of Art. 3;Violation of Art. 5-1-c;Violation of Art. 5-3;Violation of Art. 5-4;Remainder inadmissible;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses (Convention proceedings) - claim dismissed
